turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, how can i be of your assistance today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey there, I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would really like a cinnamon almond milk macchiato grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that sounds really nice, a grande cinnamon almond milk macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok sounds good, which store you would like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Starbucks on 4400 Sharon Road Charlotte, North Carolina.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4400 sharon road charlotte north carolina got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok drink has been ordered at the local store and will be ready for pickup in 10 min.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.
